title: Mikaela Shiffrin Races to Rare Win in World Cup Downhill Edging out Sofia Goggia at St. Moritz
description: US skier Mikaela Shiffrin competes during the Women's Downhill race at the FIS Alpine Skiing World Cup event in St. Moritz, Switzerland, on Dec. 9, 2023. (Fabrice Coffrini/AFP)

title: LIVE 11:45 AM ET: Thousands of Israelis Rally to Urge for Remaining Hostages to Be Freed
description: A rally aimed at supporting hostages taken by the Hamas terrorist group was held at the Parliament Hill in Ottawa on Dec. 4, 2023.  (Jonathan Ren/The Epoch Times)

title: Over 5,000 Falun Gong Practitioners Participate in Annual Character Formation
description: About 5,200 Falun Gong practitioners take part in a character formation at Taiwan’s Liberty Square on Dec. 9, 2023.  (Sung Pi-lung/The Epoch Times)

title: Hard to Find the Moral High Ground in BC’s Lawsuit Against Opioid Makers
description: B.C. Attorney General Niki Sharma holds a press conference outside the B.C. Supreme Court in Vancouver on Nov. 27, 2023. (The Canadian Press/Darryl Dyck)

title: Children Vaccinated in Messenger RNA COVID-19 Trials at Higher Risk of Certain Illnesses: Study
description: A nurse administers a dose of a COVID-19 vaccine to a girl at a clinic in Los Angeles on Jan. 19, 2022. (Robyn Beck/AFP via Getty Images)

title: ANALYSIS: Leaks Suggest Frustration With NZ Government Ignoring Official Advice
description: (L-R) Winston Peters, leader of NZ First party, New Zealand Prime Minister Christopher Luxon of the centre-right National Party, and David Seymour, leader of the libertarian-ACT New Zealand party, attend the signing of an agreement to form a three-party coalition government at Parliament in Wellington on Nov. 24, 2023. (Marty Melville/AFP via Getty Images)

title: Japan Shifts Seafood Processing Hub From China to Vietnam Amidst Fukushima Fallout
description: Vietnamese workers sort out shrimps at a processing line of Kim Anh Seafood Processing Factory in southern province of Soc Trang, Feb. 21, 2004. (STR/AFP via Getty Images)

title: Italy Exits China’s Belt and Road Project
description: Italian Prime Minister Giorgia Meloni attends a press conference at the Chancellery in Berlin on Nov. 22, 2023. (Michele Tantussi/Getty Images)

title: RBA Backs Resilient Borrowers to Ride out Rate Rises
description: A bike courier rides past the entrance to the Reserve Bank of Australia (RBA) in Sydney's central business district on April 2, 2013. (Greg Wood/AFP via Getty Images)

title: Thousands to Share in $560 Million NSW Toll Relief Scheme
description: Vehicles are seen at the WestConnex M4 tunnel entrance at Haberfield in Sydney, June 7, 2022. (AAP Image/Bianca De Marchi)

title: US Blocks UN ‘Article 99’ Ceasefire Resolution, Citing Security Council’s ‘Moral Failure’
description: U.S. Ambassador to the U.N. Robert Wood speaks during a United Nations Security Council meeting on Gaza, at U.N. headquarters in New York City on Dec. 8, 2023. (Yuki Iwamura/AFP via Getty Images)

title: 12-Year-Olds Charged After Woman Beaten Unconscious at Public Transit Station
description: Edmonton Police Service car in Edmonton Alberta on Aug 1, 2023. (The Canadian Press/Jason Franson)

title: Triple-Zero ‘Risk’ as Paramedics Reject Huge Pay Offer
description: A NSW ambulance is seen departing a housing tower on Morehead Street in Redfern, Sydney, Australia, on Sept. 16, 2021. (Lisa Maree Williams/Getty Images)

title: Ex-premier Andrews Denies Public Service Is Politicised
description: Victorian Premier Daniel Andrews speaks to the media in Melbourne, Australia, on Oct. 17, 2021. (Quinn Rooney/Getty Images)

title: US Sanctions Uyghur Persecutors, Expands Chinese Imports Ban to Mark Human Rights Day
description: Secretary of State Antony Blinken meets with human rights leaders at the State Department in Washington, on Dec. 7, 2023. (Evelyn Hockstein/Reuters)

title: MPs Call for Review of Chinese Firm’s Acquisition of Shares in Canadian Rare Earth Mining Company
description: Conservative MP Shuvaloy Majumdar rises in the House of Commons during question period on Parliament Hill in Ottawa on Sept. 18, 2023. (The Canadian Press/Sean Kilpatrick)

title: Domestic Violence Hotline Expands to Text Services in Australia
description: Police block off a street at Bondi Junction, an eastern suburb of Sydney on June 27, 2023 after a shooting incident. (Andrew Leeson/AFP via Getty Images)
